name: JuneOven
0:
”Alexa, bake for 10 minutes at 325 degrees in my June Oven.”
”Alexa, preheat my June Oven to 450 degrees.”
”Alexa, when will the food be done in my June Oven?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: june
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hands-free control of your June Oven from any room of the house. Preheat your oven while you're mixing ingredients, set and check timers, and stop cooking without even taking off your oven mitts.

All of this gives you the freedom to easily multi-task, or step away from the kitchen and still ensure each dish comes out precisely the way you want it, every time.

When you enable the Alexa Skill, you'll be given a one-time security code to connect to your June Oven. Launch the "Devices" app on your oven and follow the prompts to connect.

• Set oven temperature
• Start and stop convection fans
• Set cook timers and food thermometer targets
• Ask about oven status and timer progress
• Cancel cooking
